trends: There has been one other sighting in Pocono summit
There were no other sightings in Pocono summit on or around May 2nd 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsA couple of years ago my daughter and i were at the local lake not far from our house here in Pennsylvania.It was a cloudy day not sunny grey day.First what got my attention was this big eagle flying up in the air.But then i noticed another thing yes a UFO it was grey just hovering like a saucer.I am thinking is this real.My daughter was quiet young at that time she did not see it.but i did .I will never forget that day.I never tell anyone about it.Then they gave me a message one morning.I was half asleep but my eyes started to open on my bed headboard was the holographic message.Which i do not know what it means.Tow plantes with rings around them and a comet in the middle.I am thinking someone is playing tricks on me.but it was early morning and the blinds to my room were down and closed how could this be.It was a message either where they come from or some kind of an anlignment maybe in the future.Both planets had rings around them and what appeared to be a comet.I kept it quiet all this time never telling anyone in fear people would think i am crazy.After that my daughter and i have unusual electrical experiences..Now just the other night while i was asleep i saw a grey just his face staring at me with big black watery eyes.I did not feel threatened though.I live in the woods .I do have neighbors around but would never ask them if they have experienced anything weird at all.I did not right down the date i should of when i saw that.I did not think about it.I do not take drugs or drink.
